title: AJ Style Table Lamp
body: A true timeless table piece, the AJ Style Table Lamp style by Mobelaris gives off a retro feel that makes sure your home feels lively, yet minimalistic and modern. Arne Jacobsen originally crafted the lamp for the SAS Royal Hotel in Copenhagen which perfectly lights up each of the guestâ€™s rooms with its expanded shade perfect for working desks and its ash tray base.
